item.title: 88rising,NIKI - Indigo
item.description:
작곡: .., NIKI, Roget Chahayed / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 95006 / KY: 23842

You know I’m your type
right
Mark your calendar
tonight’s gonna
Be your life’s
highlight
Boy we gon’ roll up
we gon’ roll out look
This is
the land of fast
Bet you ain’t
used to that nah
First to one-up
your last
She can stay
in your past
Honey I don’t stop
for no one
But I’d pause for you
you you you
So let’s go downtown
and get real high
It’d be psycho
to psychoanalyze
Leave all of your
inhibitions behind
Tonight let’s test all
the borderlines like
How far out does
the indigo go
Boy
let’s find out
Take the longer way
home
Have my body
all superimposed
Right on top
of yours oh
As far as
the indica goes
I’m hating
that
You’re still
in your clothes
Babe touch me
slow all adagio
Like
oh oh oh oh
Know you like a little
attitude
A little spunk
a little gumption
Well baby have
a lot of gratitude
‘Cause I can be sweet
or poised
Or a little too feisty
to function yeah
So shut up
and just hop in
We gon’ ride in style
if thrill was a sport
I’d be the poster
child
I listen
to none
But I’m all ears
for you you you yeah
So let’s drive
by the city skyline
I’m so over this
overthinkin’ mind
Leave all of your
inhibitions behind
Tonight let’s test all
the borderlines like
How far out does
the indigo go
Boy
let’s find out
Take the longer way
home
Have my body
all superimposed
Right on top
of yours oh
As far as
the indica goes
I’m hating
that
You’re still
in your clothes
Babe touch me
slow all adagio
Like
oh oh oh oh yeah
Baby go slow
slow slow slow
Under
the indigo go
Steady and slow
slow slow slow
Under the indigo
indigo
